app.name: SaveYourTime
app.tagline: Isandiso solawulo lwexesha elinceda ukuba usebenzise ixesha lakho ledijithali ngokuphuculiweyo

warn.title: Ixesha Lakho Liphelile!
warn.message: Ufikelele kumda wakho wosuku kule webhusayithi. Lithuba elihle lokujolisa ingqalelo yakho kwimisebenzi ebaluleke kakhulu!
warn.dailyStats: Namhlanje le sayithi inokusetyenziswa okupheleleyo kwe {{ totalTime }}

general.title: Iisethingi Jikelele
general.resetDataConfirm: Yonke idatha egciniweyo iza kucinywa. Esi senzo asinakurhoxiswa. Ufuna ukuqhubeka?

timeLimit.title: Ukuthintelwa Kwexesha
timeLimit.description: Misela imida yexesha losuku kwimidiya yokuhlala kunye nezinye iiwebhusayithi ezikuphazamisayo. Uya kukukhumbuza ngokucolekileyo xa ufikelele kumda.

statistics.title: Iinkcukacha zokusetyenziswa
statistics.description: Landela ixesha ozichithela kwiisayithi ezahlukeneyo ngeeggrafu ezibonisa ngokubhekiselele kwaye ulawule ixesha lakho ngcono.

blocking.title: Ukuvinjela Okukrelekrele
blocking.description: Khetha phakathi kokuvinjela okupheleleyo okanye iinkumbuzelo ezinobubele xa imimiselo yexesha idlulile. Ungongeza ixesha elongezelelweyo xa kufuneka.

steps.title: Yongeza Iiwebhusayithi
steps.description: Yongeza iiwebhusayithi ofuna ukuthintelwa kwixesha kuzo kwaye ubeke umda wexesha losuku kwisayithi nganye.

steps.title: Ukulandela Ukusetyenziswa
steps.description: Isandiso sisebenza ngokuthulileyo ngasemva, silandelela ixesha olichithayo kwiiwebhusayithi ezichongiweyo.

steps.title: Isaziso Somda
steps.description: Xa ixesha lakho limiselweyo liphelelwa, uya kubona inkumbuzelo enobubele phambi kokuba uqhubeke.

steps.title: Ulawulo Oluntsokotha
steps.description: Ungandisa ixesha okanye ususe yonke imimiselo xa kuyimfuneko. Usoloko ulawula.

privacy.title: Ubumfihlo kunye Nokhuseleko Lwedatha
privacy.description: SaveYourTime igcina yonke idatha yakho kuphela ngokukwibhrawuza yakho kwaye ayithumeli naluphi na ulwazi kwiiseva zangaphandle. Idatha yokusetyenziswa kwesayithi yakho kunye neesethingi zigcinwe ngokukhuselekileyo kwindawo "yokugcina ekuhlaleni" yebhrawuza yakho.
privacy.details: Isandiso sethu sidinga iimvume ezingephi kwaye sifikelela kuphela kwiisayithi ozichongayo. Ubumfihlo bakho kunye nokhuseleko lwedatha ziziinto zethu esizibeka phambili.
privacy.openSource: Yonke ikhowudi yomthombo ivuleleke kwaye inokuqwalaselwa kwaye ilungiswe ukusuka kwiphepha lethu leGitHub.
privacy.learnMore: Ukufunda ngakumbi malunga nomgaqo-nkqubo wethu wabucala

privacy.title: Umgaqo-nkqubo Wabucala we-SaveYourTime
privacy.subtitle: Ulwazi malunga nendlela esikhuselela ngayo ubumfihlo bedatha yakho

commitment.title: Ukuzibophelela Kubumfihlo
commitment.description: Kwi-SaveYourTime, siyalixabisa ubumfihlo bakho kunye nokhuseleko lwedatha. Esi sandiso [hl]asithumeli naluphi na ulwazi kwiiseva zangaphandle[/hl], kwaye lonke ulwazi lwakho lugcinwe kuphela kwibhrawuza yakho.

collected.title: Ulwazi Oluqokelelweyo
collected.intro: I-SaveYourTime iqokelela kwaye ibhale kuphela olu lwazi lulandelayo:
collected.storage: Olu lwazi [hl]lugcinwe kuphela kwibhrawuza yakho yengingqi[/hl] kwaye luyimfuneko ukuze isandiso sisebenze ngokufanelekileyo.

storage.title: Ugcino Lwedata kunye Nokugqithiswa
storage.noSend: [hl]Ayithumeli naluphi na ulwazi lomsebenzisi kwiiseva zangaphandle[/hl]
storage.localStorage: Igcina yonke idatha kwindawo yokugcina yendawo yebhrawuza yakho
storage.noTracking: Ayilandeleli naziphi na iinkcukacha zomsebenzisi okanye ulwazi lweseshoni

security.title: Ukhuseleko Lwedatha
security.intro: Njengoko idatha yakho igcinwe kuphela kwibhrawuza yakho:
security.browserClear: Ingacinywa ukuba usula imbali yebhrawuza yakho okanye i-cache
security.uninstall: Ungasula yonke idatha erekhodiweyo kwibhrawuza yakho xa ususa isandiso
security.access: Kuphela ibhrawuza yakho ingafikelela kwidatha yakho

permissions.title: Iimvume
permissions.intro: I-SaveYourTime ifuna ezi mvume zebhrawuza zilandelayo ukuze isebenze:
permissions.activeTab: Ukufikelela kwithabhu esebenzayo (ukubekela iliso ixesha elichithwe kwiiwebhusayithi ozichongileyo)
permissions.storage: Ukufikelela kwindawo yokugcina yangaphakathi (ukugcina iisethingi zakho kunye nolwazi lwexesha)
permissions.minimal: Ezi mvume ziyeyona ncinci efunekayo kwindlela yokusebenza ephambili yesandiso.

openSource.title: Ikhowudi yoMthombo oVulekileyo
openSource.description: I-SaveYourTime yiprojekthi evuleleke ngokupheleleyo. Isiseko sethu sekhowudi siyafumaneka ukuze nabani na ahlole ku-GitHub.
openSource.transparency: Le nto yokufikeleleka ibonisa ukuzimisela kwethu kubumfihlo. Nabani na onqwenela ukujonga ikhowudi angaqinisekisa ukuba isandiso ngenene asithumeli nayiphi na idatha.

rights.title: Amalungelo Omsebenzisi
rights.remove: Ukususa isandiso kwiisethingi zebhrawuza yakho nangaliphi na ixesha
rights.delete: Ukucima yonke idatha erekhodiweyo kwiisethingi zesandiso
rights.modify: Ukuguqula nayiphi na idatha ofuna ukuyiguqula kwiisethingi zesandiso

questions.title: Imibuzo
questions.contact: Ukuba unayo nayiphi na imibuzo malunga nomgaqo-nkqubo wethu wabucala, nceda uqhagamshelane nathi ngeprojekthi yethu yeGitHub.
